content:
That's great to hear! Congratulations on getting your soundbar working with your new TV! It's always a relief when older devices play nice with new ones.

Now, let's get back to Schitt's Creek! Starting from the beginning is a great idea. You'll get to see the Rose family's transformation from their lavish lifestyle to their humble new life in Schitt's Creek. The show's creators, Eugene Levy and his son Dan Levy, did an amazing job developing the characters and storylines throughout the series.

As you watch, keep an eye out for the incredible performances from the entire cast, especially Eugene Levy and Catherine O'Hara as Johnny and Moira Rose. They're absolutely fantastic!

Feel free to come back and chat with me about the show whenever you'd like. I'd love to hear your thoughts, discuss your favorite characters, or answer any questions you might have. Happy bingeing!
